titleStmt.title: The monk's hood pull'd off, or, The Capvcin fryar described in two parts / translated out of French.
Capucin. English
titleStmt.author: Du Moulin, Pierre, 1568-1658.
Basile, de Rouen, d. 1648?

notesStmt.note: The first part is by Du Moulin, the second by François Clouet (Basile de Rouen). Cf. "The translator to the reader."
The translation of Du Moulin's Le Capucin appeared originally (1665) under title: The Capucin treated. Cf. NUC Pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
